decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 222268FUL dated 28/10/2022 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow amendments to the design of the full height windows on the East and West elevations and omission of the Juliette balconies associated with them in relation to planning permission reference 222268FUL dated 28/10/2022 for 'Construction of a 4 storey building, part of it over the existing garages, to accommodate 9 self-contained flats along with the provision of dedicated waste and cycle storage.'
